about_the_game:
Attack on the I Ching is an educational game created for young people as an ideal introduction to traditional I Ching culture!

You are reading this page right now, maybe you are not only interested in learning the I Ching, maybe you have tried to learn it before, but you can't even remember the sixty-four hexagrams? This is completely normal, so don't worry! Learning the mystical I Ching, especially rising to the heights of philosophy, can be daunting. With something mysterious like the I Ching, full of strange symbols, you may not even know where to start.

You need a learning tool that interests you to tackle the challenge of boredom! On top of that, this will help you get more magical rewards! .

It's not just educational software, it's a roguelike RPG designed to keep you engaged. Through the game, you will learn the I Ching like never before.

In this process, you will memorize the 64 hexagrams of the I Ching by passing the repetition of not counting. Your success will be put to the test on the battlefield! A handsome master asks you to help him practice the I Ching, and he will create all kinds of difficulties. As a goblin, can you let him mess up his concentration first?

Game Features:

1. The purpose of this game is to memorize the original text of the I Ching. Due to the specific interpretation of the I Ching, many scholars have different understandings, resulting in different interpretations of the same content. Therefore, the explanations involved in this game are based on the original interpretation of the oracle bone inscription, combined with the history of the Shang Dynasty and the early Zhou Dynasty at that time, guess what King Wen of Zhou and Gongdan of Zhou thought and determine the meaning, which is only used to help memory. Therefore, the philosophical aspects modified by Confucius (Yi Chuan) are not included.
2. Different from traditional teaching methods, this game learns relevant knowledge through random and trial and error, rather than step-by-step explanation.
3. Constant repetition is the best way to memorize, but repetition is very boring. In order to avoid boredom, we have designed the following methods:
Sexy goblins with different characteristics as the heroine.
Hexagram names and sequencing are read in female phonetic tones and repeated through basic skills.
For uncommon Chinese characters, the pronunciation is indicated in Hanyu Pinyin.
Roguelike gameplay and free RPG elements.
A magical system of I Ching practice, acquire skills for quiz learning.

We look forward to your feedback to help keep the game updated.
Please leave a message in the Steam community

What is I Ching?

The Book of Changes is an ancient Chinese scripture about the changes in the world of Vientiane. This is a profoundly dialectical philosophical work. In practical use, it is also a magical magic book used for divination, a royal book for prophesying the development of future events. The Book of Changes summarizes the laws of these prophecies, and Confucius formed a philosophical theory. The Book of Changes covers philosophy, politics, life, literature, art, science and other fields, and is a classic of Confucianism and Taoism, and is the source of Chinese civilization.

content_descriptors.notes: The characters in the game wear sexy costumes, and the player's actions in the game cause the body parts to grow or change.

name: Attack on I-Ching  进击的易经

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: A master needs you to help him practice the I Ching. As a goblin, have you conquered the master in the midst of all kinds of difficulties created by the master? It's a roguelike educational game designed to keep you engaged. Through the game, you will learn the I Ching like never before.
